sections.heading: Procedure
sections.text: for correction of maps or plats.

sections.text: may be made; preparation and contents of map.

sections.text: of surveyor; employment of other engineers.

sections.text: of original map with clerk; posting of copies; notice of time for objections.

sections.text: and exceptions to plat: Form and contents.

sections.text:
to commence action in district court; contents of complaint; notice of lis

sections.heading: Contents
sections.text:
and posting of summons; property deemed within jurisdiction of district court;

sections.heading: Further
sections.text: pleadings: Nevada Rules of Civil Procedure; hearing given precedence.

sections.heading: Findings
sections.text:
of fact, conclusions of law and judgment; recording of certified copy of

sections.heading: City
sections.text:
attorney or district attorney may prosecute action; employment of other

counsel.

sections.heading: Questions
sections.text:
of fact may be referred to master; property may be taken for public use;

sections.heading: Equitable
sections.text:
jurisdiction of court to settle rights, conflicts and controversies; court may

sections.heading: Person
sections.text:
claiming material injury may commence action to have order of vacation set

aside.
